_header: Flower of maidens all Tu gloria virginitatis
Subjects: Virgin Mary, prayer to; prayers, to Virgin Mary
_description: Four lines asking for grace from the Virgin Mary, at the end of one MS of the Pricke of Conscience—four lines rhyming abab

CamStJohn137.Transcription:
ffloure of Maydens alle Tu gloria virginitatisWhan we to þe
                    calleRege nos sociando beatis
CamStJohn137.Note:
Written first four lines as two lines in MS; at end of Pricke of
                    Conscience in this MS only; followed by 1914.5.
CamStJohn137.Editions:
James,  Montague Rhodes. 
             A Descriptive Catalogue of the Manuscripts in the Library of St.
                John’s College, Cambridge.
         Cambridge: at the UP, 1913: 174.
